summary: You go on a trip to morrowind but something bad happen and guess who is behind it THE THALMOR!!!. mission kill shadow the evil thalmor leader but were is he on a huge island. you must find and kill shadow before he takes over the world shadow made 1 mistake and now he is mad.
descriptionHtml:
You go on a trip to morrowind but something bad happen and guess who is behind it THE THALMOR!!!. mission kill shadow the evil thalmor leader but were is he on a huge island. you must find and kill shadow before he takes over the world shadow made 1 mistake and now he is mad. 

You will get a letter in or inventory in books then carry on with what it say 

this is about going on a trip and then getting shot down by a evil thalmor and getting your revenge and saving the island 

Requires 
tropical Skyrim by soolie
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33017//

Beta tester
Big thanks to MGtheBAdAZz
